title: I Teleport when I Laughed - Novel Updates
tags: Cultivation   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Abilities   Interdimensional Travel   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple POV   World Travel
author: 欢颜笑语
description:
I really don’t want to teleport!

Imagine that when you go to the toilet, you suddenly think something happy, can’t hold back laughing and teleported. Now you are on the top of the Forbidden City. Ximen Chuixue on the left, Ye Gucheng on the right, and a guy with four eyebrows staring at you on the opposite side. And you, haven’t wiped your ass yet. 

Lin Zihua: So what should I do now?!>
